baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，春、夏、冬一切時人間遊行，除餘因緣者，波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 95

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī antovassaṁ cārikaṁ careyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 39

translations.text: Welche Nonne sich aber während der Regenzeit auf Wanderschaft begibt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni set out on a journey during the rains retreat, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang melakukan suatu perjalanan selama masa vassa, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼於安居內遊行。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 92

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。夏中無因緣遊行他國。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 95

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼夏安居未為。隨意人間遊行者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 101

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。安居竟不遊行者波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 134
